summary: Implemented a shared BackNav component and applied it across Feed, Geography, Tasks (list/detail/create), and Profile pages with a consistent container/header layout. Home “Get Started” CTA changes are implied via App.tsx and the diff summaries, but some back-control labeling consistency may not fully match the requested uniform pattern.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the same UI pattern (including consistent labeling) for backward navigation controls across Feed, Tasks, and Geography; Task detail and task create should keep their existing 'Back to List' behavior/pattern while matching shared styling.
missing_requirements.reason: Task detail/create back controls use label="Back to Tasks", while other pages use the default label "Back"; the request calls out consistent labeling/pattern, and explicitly references existing 'Back to List' on task detail/create.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded global styling/theme changes (e.g., Tailwind token adjustments and global CSS updates) beyond the page-level navigation/styling consistency requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on navigation and consistent page layout across specific pages; broad theme/token/global CSS refactors are not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Large documentation additions/updates (architecture, phased plan, deployment, style guide) not requested as part of the navigation/styling changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains only frontend navigation/styling requirements and constraints; documentation expansion is not requested.
